name: Active
short-description: Dry food for very active dogs
description: Dry food specially formulated for very active dogs. It provides the necessary energy and nutrients to support their active lifestyle.
benefits: Provides high energy for active dogs. Contains essential nutrients for optimal performance. Supports overall health and vitality.
ingredients: Pork fat, wheat, maize protein, fish meal, egg powder, rice, potato protein, minerals, yeast (including source of β-1,3/1,6-glucans 0.1%), dextrose, animal protein hydrolysate, fish oil, vitamins and trace elements (including chelated trace elements), psyllium husk, methionine, taurine, L-carnitine, rosemary extract. With natural antioxidants (tocopherols and vitamin C). Contains no added artificial colours or flavourings.

name: Adult All Breeds
short-description: Tasty wet food pâté for adult dogs of all breeds
description: A tasty wet food pâté specifically formulated for adult dogs of all breeds. It provides a complete and balanced nutrition with high-quality ingredients to support their overall health and well-being.
benefits: Contains high-quality ingredients for optimal nutrition. Provides a delicious and palatable taste. Supports the overall health and well-being of adult dogs.
ingredients: Beef, chicken liver, rice, carrots, peas, minerals, vitamins, egg powder, psyllium husk, dextrose, methionine, taurine, L-carnitine, fish oil, trace elements, yeast (including source of β-1,3/1,6-glucans 0.1%), rosemary extract, natural antioxidants (tocopherols and vitamin C). Contains no added artificial colours or flavourings.

name: Adult Large & Giant Breed
short-description: Dry food for adult large and giant breed over 25 kg
description: Dry food specifically designed for adult dogs of large and giant breeds weighing over 25 kg. It provides balanced nutrition to support their unique needs.
benefits: Specially formulated for large and giant breeds. Supports joint and bone health. Helps maintain an ideal body condition.
ingredients: Chicken meal, rice, maize protein, wheat, pork fat, hydrolyzed poultry protein, beet pulp, minerals, fish meal, fish oil, yeast (including source of β-1,3/1,6-glucans 0.1%), psyllium husk, vitamins, taurine, L-carnitine, rosemary extract. With natural antioxidants (tocopherols and vitamin C). Contains no added artificial colours or flavourings.

name: Dental Chew Large
short-description: Tasty chew for support of oral health in adult dogs with body weight above 15 kg.
description: Tasty chew specifically designed to support oral health in adult dogs with a body weight above 15 kg. It has a special texture and ingredients to help reduce plaque and tartar buildup.
benefits: Promotes good oral health. Helps reduce plaque and tartar buildup. Provides a delicious and enjoyable chewing experience.
ingredients: Rice flour, potato starch, vegetable glycerine, dried pork protein, cellulose powder, dried seaweed, minerals (including 2% sodium hexametaphosphate), maize protein, green tea extract, eucalyptus oil, parsley oil, pomegranate extract, cranberry extract. With natural antioxidants (tocopherols and vitamin C). The treats contain no artificial colours or flavourings.

name: Lunch
short-description: Tasty wet food pâté for very active dogs
description: Tasty wet food pâté specially formulated for very active dogs. It provides a balanced nutrition to support their high energy requirements.
benefits: Highly palatable. Provides essential nutrients for active dogs. Supports their overall health and well-being.
ingredients: Chicken, pork, wheat, maize, egg powder, fish meal, rice, fish oil, minerals, yeast (including source of β-1,3/1,6-glucans 0.1%), psyllium husk, methionine, taurine, L-carnitine, rosemary extract. With natural antioxidants (tocopherols and vitamin C). Contains no added artificial colours or flavourings.

name: Adult Medium Breed
short-description: Dry food for adult medium breed between 10 and 25 kg
description: Dry food specially formulated for adult dogs of medium breeds weighing between 10 and 25 kg. It provides a balanced and complete nutrition for their unique needs.
benefits: Tailored for medium breeds. Supports their energy requirements. Promotes overall health and well-being.
ingredients: Chicken meal, rice, maize protein, wheat, pork fat, hydrolyzed poultry protein, beet pulp, minerals, fish meal, fish oil, yeast (including source of β-1,3/1,6-glucans 0.1%), psyllium husk, vitamins, taurine, L-carnitine, rosemary extract. With natural antioxidants (tocopherols and vitamin C). Contains no added artificial colours or flavourings.

name: Organic with Beef
short-description: Organic wet food pâté for healthy adult dogs
description: Organic wet food pâté with beef, specifically formulated for healthy adult dogs. Made with certified organic ingredients, it provides a natural and nutritious meal.
benefits: Certified organic ingredients. High-quality beef. Promotes overall health and well-being.
ingredients: Beef*, pork*, chicken*, rice*, sunflower oil*, fish meal, fish oil, minerals, yeast (including source of β-1,3/1,6-glucans 0.1%), psyllium husk, vitamins, taurine, rosemary extract. With natural antioxidants (tocopherols and vitamin C). Contains no added artificial colours or flavourings. *Certified organic ingredient.
